patthana10.17:2.1_1: ārammaṇe nava …pe… aññamaññe pañcavīsa …pe… avigate tiṁsa. (Piṭṭhidukaṁ vitthāretabbaṁ.)
patthana10.17:3.1_0: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ nasaraṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho nasaraṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana10.17:3.1_1: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ nasaraṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naanidassanasappaṭigho nasaraṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana10.17:3.1_2: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ nasaraṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naanidassanaappaṭigho nasaraṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …pe… cha.
patthana10.17:4.1_0: Naanidassanasappaṭighaṁ nasaraṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naanidassanasappaṭigho nasaraṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana10.17:4.1_1: Naanidassanasappaṭighaṁ nasaraṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho nasaraṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …pe… cha.
patthana10.17:5.1_0: Naanidassanaappaṭighaṁ nasaraṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naanidassanaappaṭigho nasaraṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … cha.
patthana10.17:6.1_0: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ nasaraṇañca naanidassanaappaṭighaṁ nasaraṇañca dhammaṁ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho nasaraṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … cha.
patthana10.17:7.1_0: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ nasaraṇañca naanidassanasappaṭighaṁ nasaraṇañca dhammaṁ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho nasaraṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … cha.
patthana10.17:8.1_1: ārammaṇe nava …pe… aññamaññe pañcavīsa …pe… avigate tiṁsa. (Sabbattha vitthāro.)
patthana10.17:9.1_0: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ naaraṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho naaraṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana10.17:9.1_1: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ naaraṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naanidassanasappaṭigho naaraṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana10.17:9.1_2: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ naaraṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho naaraṇo ca naanidassanasappaṭigho naaraṇo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana10.17:10.1_0: Naanidassanasappaṭighaṁ naaraṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naanidassanasappaṭigho naaraṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana10.17:10.1_1: Naanidassanasappaṭighaṁ naaraṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho naaraṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana10.17:10.1_2: Naanidassanasappaṭighaṁ naaraṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho naaraṇo ca naanidassanasappaṭigho naaraṇo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana10.17:11.1_0: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ naaraṇañca naanidassanasappaṭighaṁ naaraṇañca dhammaṁ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho naaraṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana10.17:11.1_1: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ naaraṇañca naanidassanasappaṭighaṁ naaraṇañca dhammaṁ paṭicca naanidassanasappaṭigho naaraṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana10.17:11.1_2: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ naaraṇañca naanidassanasappaṭighaṁ naaraṇañca dhammaṁ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho naaraṇo ca naanidassanasappaṭigho naaraṇo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana10.17:12.1_2: (Sahajātavārepi paccayavārepi nissayavārepi saṁsaṭṭhavārepi sampayuttavārepi sabbattha nava.)
